question: What is JBoss and what primary function does it serve?
answers: A web development framework for building websites
A content management system for managing web content
A Java-based application server for deploying and hosting enterprise applications
A database management system for managing relational databases

question: What is a datasource in JBoss and how is it typically defined?
answers: An abstract class for extending server functionality, typically defined in server.xml
A repository for storing data, typically defined in persistence.xml
A component for database connections, typically defined in standalone.xml
A unit for monitoring performance metrics, typically defined in metrics.xml

it: Cos'è una datasource in JBoss e come viene tipicamente definita?
Una classe astratta per estendere le funzionalità del server, tipicamente definito in server.xml
Un repository per memorizzare dati, tipicamente definito in persistence.xml
Un componente per le connessioni al database, tipicamente definito in standalone.xml
Un'unità per il monitoraggio delle metriche di performance, tipicamente definito in metrics.xml
